en.RC_IDC_BUTTON_SELECT: Select all objects of same name
en.RC_LT_CAMERA_HEIGHT_HINT: Hint: You can also use Q && E to change height.
en.RC_LT_PROJECT_HINT: Hints: Left Mouse Button: Select Lock Region Middle Mouse Button: Move 3D Camera to Point Right Mouse Button: Scroll Map Scroll Wheel: Zoom In/Out Map
en.RC_LT_PAGE_TERRAIN_SHOW_OVERLAY: Show Overlay (draw mask regions in red)
en.RC_LT_PAGE_TERRAIN_PAINT_MASK: Paint Entire Space Using Selected Mask
en.RC_LT_PAGE_TERRAIN_TEXTURE_HINT: Hint: Hold Alt to sample the texture under the cursor. Hold Ctrl+Alt to sample the texture and opacity under the cursor. Hold Shift to enable the texture projection gizmo. Hold Shift+Alt to adjust the gizmo's rotation to match the terrain.
en.RCST_TER_PAINT_SAVE_BTN: Save the current brush settings to a file
en.RCST_TER_PAINT_EDITMODE: Edit the texture projections already on the terrain
en.RCST_IDC_WEATHER_SYSTEMS_LIST: Lists all the available weather systems The checkboxes denote whether the weather system is used by the current space, or excluded from it
en.RCST_IDC_WEATHER_DEFAULT: Set the selected weather system as the default system for the current space
en.RCST_IDC_SKY_BOXES_LIST: List of the sky boxes used by the weather system. Note that you can drag and drop model files from the Asset Browser here to add sky boxes to the list
en.RCST_IDC_WEATHER_SKYBOX_ADD: Add a new sky box to the weather system. Alternatively you can drag and drop model files from the Asset Browser into the sky boxes list
en.RCST_IDC_WEATHER_SKYBOX_CLEAR: Deletes all sky boxes from the weather system
en.RCST_IDC_SKYBOX_UP: Move the selected sky box up in the list
en.RCST_IDC_SKYBOX_DOWN: Move the selected sky box down in the list
en.RCST_IDC_SKYBOX_DEL: Delete the selected sky box from the list
en.RC_IDC_SELECT_ALL: Select whole fences (hold SHIFT to select one section)
en.RC_LT_TIPS1: Tips: - to rotate first section of fence, press and hold Alt key and move mouse pointer around, then release Alt key
en.RC_LT_TIPS2: - to fine-tune section position before placing, press and hold Shift key - to lock fence placement direction, press and hold Ctrl key - "Distance between sections" can be negative or positive
en.RC_IDC_NEW_SPACE_CHANGE_SPACE_BUTTON: Change to new space after created
en.RC_IDC_TAKE_PHOTO_DESC: This dialog is used to create a bitmap representation of the space that can be used in other tools such as SpaceViewer. An image is created for each chunk and saved to "res/SPACENAME/space_viewer/".
en.RC_IDC_STATIC_INFO:
This will reduce or expand the bounds of the space by adding new outdoor chunks along the borders. Please specify the number of chunks to resize by in each direction.
Warning: This operation cannot be undone.
en.RC_LT_RESIZE_WARNING: Resizing the terrain texture blends map cannot be undone. Press 'Cancel' now to avoid resizing the blends map.
en.RC_LT_PLACEMENT_PRESETS_RANDOM_ROTATION: Random Rotation (Yaw, Pitch and Roll degrees)
en.RC_IDC_PLACEMENT_PRESETS_ALL_AXES_BUTTON: Apply scale proportionally on all axes
en.RC_LT_TERRAIN_IMPORT_HINT: Left Mouse Button: Select Terrain Middle Mouse Button: Move 3D Camera to Point Right Mouse Button: Scroll Map Scroll Wheel: Zoom In/Out Map Shift: Snap to Chunk Grid Alt: Sample Max. Height Ctrl: Sample Min. Height
en.RC_LT_TERRAIN_RULER_HINT:
Left Mouse Button: Click to set start point and click again to set end point or click and drag for interactive measurement.
Hold Shift to adjust the start position. Hold Ctrl to adjust the end position.
en.RCST_IDC_TERRAIN_RULER_DISTANCE: The distance measured by the ruler
en.RCST_IDC_TERRAIN_RULER_HORZ_DISTANCE: The horizontal component of the measured distance
en.RCST_IDC_TERRAIN_RULER_VERT_DISTANCE: The vertical component of the measured distance
en.RCST_IDC_TERRAIN_RULER_WIDTH_SLIDER: Adjusts the size of the ruler object in the scene
en.RCST_IDC_TERRAIN_RULER_VERTICAL_MODE: Check to lock the ruler to measure only vertically
en.RCST_IDC_EDIT_FENCE_MODELNAME: The asset path used as a component of the fence tool
en.RCST_IDC_BUTTON_FENCE_STARTNEW: Click to start a new fence group
en.RCST_IDC_CHECKBOX_FENCE_ALIGNNORMAL: Check to align newly placed fence components to the terrain normal
en.RCST_IDC_CHECKBOX_FENCE_SELECTWHOLE: Check to force the selection of a single fence piece to also select any other fence pieces that were created at the same time as the selected fence as part of a fence object.
en.RCST_IDC_EDIT_FENCE_STEP: Type in the offset distance between consecutive fence components. Negative values are also acceptable and will cause the offset to be towards the previously placed fence component.
en.RC_LT_UNDOWARN_TEXT: Process Data may need to clear the Undo/Redo history. Are you sure you want to continue?
en.RC_SHADER_LOADING_STATIC: Shaders are compiling, this may take a few minutes. NOTE: This only occurs if shaders have been changed.
en.RC_LT_OUT_OF_MEMORY_QUESTION: Your system is very low on memory. What do you want to do?
en.RC_IDC_OUT_OF_MEMORY_SAVE_BUTTON: Save Chunks and Clear Undo History. This will free up as much memory as possible, but you won't be able to undo any prior changes.
en.RC_IDC_OUT_OF_MEMORY_CONTINUE_BUTTON: Continue without doing anything. You may experience memory issues causing data loss. Please save your work as soon as possible.
en.RC_IDC_PAGE_TEXTURE_LATCH: Show when the Terrain Texturing tool is activated
en.RCST_IDC_SB_GROUP_BY: Allows grouping assets by a column or showing them in a flat list
en.RCST_IDC_PP_SAVE_CHAIN: Save changes done to the chain
en.RCST_IDC_PP_DISCARD_CHANGES: Discard changes done to the chain
en.RCST_IDC_PP_ZOOM_IN: Zoom in. You can also zoom using the mouse wheel
en.RCST_IDC_PP_ZOOM_OUT: Zoom out. You can also zoom using the mouse wheel
en.RCST_IDC_PP_NOZOOM: Go back to the default zoom. You can also zoom using the mouse wheel
en.RCST_IDC_PP_3D_PREVIEW: Toggle live preview of each phase's output
en.RCST_IDC_PP_PROFILE: Toggle profiling the GPU time used by this chain. While on, performance will be reduced
en.RCST_IDC_PP_LAYOUT: Cycle through the different layout options for this panel
en.RCST_IDC_PP_DELETE_ALL: Delete all effects and their phases
en.RCST_ID_INDICATOR_CHUNKS: Select all objects (as per selection filter) Select All
en.RCST_ID_MENU_SAVECAMERAPOSITION: Save WorldEditor camera position for next start. Save Camera Position
en.RCST_IDS_NOLOADSKYBOX: The sky box could not be loaded. Please check that it is a valid A8R8G8B8 image file. The texture may require an associated .texformat file.
en.RCST_IDS_NOLOADSKYDOME: The sky dome failed to load.
en.RCST_ID_MENU_SAVETEMPLATE: Save as default lighting template for the chunk. Save Lighting Template
en.RCST_IDS_NOTRESPATH: The resource's path is invalid because it is not in your project's resource tree. Please place it in your project's resource tree, or update the BW_RES_PATH environment variable.
en.RCST_IDS_FAILED_IMPORT_TERRAIN: Unable to parse the terrain image file.
en.RCST_IDS_LARGE_IMPORT: Importing such large terrain cannot be undone. Furthermore, it will write to the terrain on disk. Do you wish to proceed?
en.RCST_ID_MENU_SAVESTARTPOSITION: Save game start position. Save Start Position
en.RCST_ID_MENU_SHOWSIDEPANEL: Show or hide the side menu panel. Toggle Side Menu
en.RCST_IDS_BADCODEC_IMPORT_TERRAIN: Unable to select an appropriate codec. Please change the extension of the file to match supported codecs.
en.RCST_IDS_FILESMUSTDIFFER: The file {0} cannot be copied over itself.
en.RCST_IDS_NOLOADSKYGRADIENT: The skybox gradient could not be read. Please check that it is a valid A8R8G8B8 image file.
en.RCST_ID_MENU_SAVEPREFAB: Save selected objects as prefab. Save Prefab
en.RCST_ID_FILE_SAVE_AS: Save the active document with a new name Save As
en.RCST_ID_APP_ABOUT: Display program information, version number and copyright About
en.RCST_ID_HELP_USING: Display instructions about how to use help Help
en.RCST_ID_CONTEXT_HELP: Display help for clicked on buttons, menus and windows Help
en.RCST_ID_HELP: Display help for current task or command Help
en.RCST_ID_NEXT_PANE: Switch to the next window pane Next Pane
en.RCST_ID_PREV_PANE: Switch back to the previous window pane Previous Pane
en.RCST_ID_WINDOW_SPLIT: Split the active window into panes Split
en.RCST_ID_EDIT_COPY: Copy the selection and put it on the Clipboard Copy
en.RCST_ID_EDIT_CUT: Cut the selection and put it on the Clipboard Cut
en.RCST_ID_EDIT_REPLACE: Replace specific text with different text Replace
en.RCST_ID_EDIT_SELECT_ALL: Select the entire document Select All
en.RCST_ID_EDIT_REDO: Redo the previously undone action Redo
en.RCST_AFX_IDS_SCMINIMIZE: Reduce the window to an icon
en.RCST_AFX_IDS_SCMAXIMIZE: Enlarge the window to full size
en.RCST_AFX_IDS_SCNEXTWINDOW: Switch to the next document window
en.RCST_AFX_IDS_SCPREVWINDOW: Switch to the previous document window
en.RCST_AFX_IDS_SCCLOSE: Close the active window and prompts to save the documents
en.RCST_AFX_IDS_SCRESTORE: Restore the window to normal size
en.RCST_ID_BUTTON_REDO: Redo the last undone action Redo (CTRL+Y)
en.RCST_IDS_LARGE_IMPORT_MASK: Importing such large terrain mask cannot be undone. Furthermore, it will write to the space to disk. Do you wish to proceed?
en.RCST_ID_BUTTON_BG_UPDATE: Use background updating of static lighting and terrain shadows Background Updating
en.RCST_ID_BUTTON_QUICKSAVE: Save chunk files only. Quick Save (CTRL+S)
en.RCST_ID_BUTTON_FULLSAVE: Calculate static lighting, terrain shadows and save. Full Save (CTRL+ALT+S)
en.RCST_ID_BUTTON_LOAD_ALL: Mark all chunks as candidates for loading Load All
en.RCST_ID_BUTTON_PLAYER_PREVIEW: Toggle Player Preview Mode Player Preview Mode (~)
en.RCST_IDC_COORDINATION_FILTER: Reference Coordinate System Reference Coordinate System (F8 cycles)
en.RCST_IDC_B_EDIT: The blue component of the selected color.
en.RCST_IDC_TURBOFFS: Base level of air turbidity, or amount of suspended particulate matter. Proportionally affects MIE scattering effect.
en.RCST_IDC_VERTHEIGHTEFFECT: Vertex height contribution to MIE scattering effect.
en.RCST_IDC_TURBFACTOR: Multiplier on air turbidity, or how the MIE scattering effect responds to increases in the global fog amount.
en.RCST_IDC_SUNHEIGHTEFFECT: Sun height contribution to MIE scattering effect.
en.RCST_IDC_POWER: Mathematical power of MIE scattering effect.
en.RCST_IDC_CLEARSKYDOME_BTN: Clear all of the sky models.
en.RCST_IDC_TURBFACTOR_SLIDER: Multiplier on air turbidity, or how the MIE scattering effect responds to increases in the global fog amount.
en.RCST_IDC_PAGE_TERRAIN_TEXS_PER_CHUNK_BUT: Show/hide the warning for chunks with more textures than the maximum
en.RCST_IDC_POWER_SLIDER: Mathematical power of MIE scattering effect.
en.RCST_IDC_TEXLOD_START_EDIT: The distance in meters at which texture LODs start, but are at their weakest.
en.RCST_IDC_TEXLOD_DIST_EDIT: The distance in meters over which texture LODs blend from zero to full strength.
en.RCST_IDC_TEXLOD_PRELOAD_EDIT: The distance beyond the blend region in meters over which to start loading in texture blends.
en.RCST_IDC_OBJECTS_SELECTION_FILTER: Choose which objects can be selected in the main 3D view
en.RCST_IDC_OBJECTS_SELECT_PLACEMENT_SETTIN: Choose a random placement preset, or choose ""Normal Placement"" to avoid using random placement
en.RCST_IDC_OBJECTS_COORDS_WORLD: Transforms will be relative to the world's axes (F8 cycles)
en.RCST_IDC_OBJECTS_TO_REPLACE_EDIT: Objects in the space to be replaced
en.RCST_IDC_OBJECTS_FILTER: When this checkbox is checked, only the object specified above can be selected in the space.
en.RCST_IDC_OBJECTS_REPLACE_WITH_EDIT: Replace selected objects with this object
en.RCST_IDC_OBJECTS_SELECT_SAME_NAME_BTN: Select all objects to be replaced in the space
en.RCST_IDC_RANDSCAX_MAX: Set maximum random scale in the X axis
en.RCST_IDC_TURBOFFS_SLIDER: Base level of air turbidity, or amount of suspended particulate matter. Proportionally affects MIE scattering effect.
en.RCST_IDC_VERTHEIGHTEFFECT_SLIDER: Vertex height contribution to MIE scattering effect.
en.RCST_IDC_SUNHEIGHTEFFECT_SLIDER: Sun height contribution to MIE scattering effect.
en.RCST_IDC_SKYFILE_EDIT: The file used to save the sky data.
en.RCST_IDC_SKYFILE_BTN: Browse for a different sky file.
en.RCST_IDC_NEWSKYFILE_BTN: Copy the current sky file to a new file. This allows the sky file to be used by this space alone.
en.RCST_IDC_PROJECT_UPDATE: Update all space files from server
en.RCST_IDC_PROJECT_LOD_OVERLAY: Show chunks that have a locked LOD
en.RCST_IDC_SKYDOME_LIST: The list of static sky boxes used by this space. The Weather Systems item specifies where the dynamic weather will be sorted with respect to these sky models
en.RCST_IDC_PROJECT_MAP_ALPHA_SLIDER: Fade between the hand-drawn map and the actual terrain map
en.RCST_IDC_TODFILE_BTN: Browse for a time of day file.
en.RCST_IDC_PAGE_TERRAIN_SIZE_BUTTON: Adjust the range of the size slider
en.RCST_IDC_NEWTODFILE_BTN: Copy the current time of day file to a new file. This allows the time of day file to be used by this space alone.
en.RCST_IDC_RANDROTX_RESET: Reset rotation yaw range to default
en.RCST_IDC_ADDCOLOR_BTN: Add a new color. Select a point on the timeline on the left to add a new time. You can then change its color by using the color selector on the right.
en.RCST_IDC_SIZERANGE: Adjust the range of the Size slider
en.RCST_IDC_PROJECT_SELECTION_LOCK: Prevents other people from modifying the selected chunks
en.RCST_IDC_TODFILE_EDIT: The file used to save the time of day data.
en.RCST_IDC_HOURLENGTH: The real time required for an hour of time in the game. 3600 means one hour of real time is one hour of game time, 1800 means half an hour of real time is one hour of game time and so on.
en.RCST_IDC_STARTTIME: The starting time in the game.
en.RCST_IDC_RANDSCAX_MIN: Set minimun random scale in the X axis
en.RCST_IDC_RANDSCAY_RESET: Reset scale range in the Y axis to default
en.RCST_IDC_SPACE: Name of the new space to be created
en.RCST_IDC_CHUNKSIZE: Length of the edge of an outdoors chunk, in metres.
en.RCST_IDC_WIDTH: Width of the space, in number of chunks.
en.RCST_IDC_HEIGHT: Height of the space, in number of chunks.
en.RCST_IDC_SPACE_PATH: Path where the new space will be created
en.RCST_IDC_MINEDIT: Set the minimum value of the range
en.RCST_IDC_MAXEDIT: Set the maximum value of the range
en.RCST_IDC_SUNANGLE_EDIT: The sun's inclination at midday. At 90 degrees the sun will pass in an arc directly overhead.
en.RCST_IDC_MOONANGLE_EDIT: The moon's inclination at midnight. At 90 degrees the moon will pass in an arc directly overhead.
en.RCST_IDC_RANDSCAY_MIN: Set minimun random scale in the Y axis
en.RCST_IDC_RANDSCAY_MAX: Set maximum random scale in the Y axis
en.RCST_IDC_RANDSCAZ_MIN: Set minimun random scale in the Z axis
en.RCST_IDC_RANDSCAZ_MAX: Set maximum random scale in the Z axis
en.RCST_IDC_RANDSCA_LINK: Adjust all scale sliders at the same time
en.RCST_IDC_RANDROT_LINK: Adjust all rotation sliders at the same time
en.RCST_IDC_RANDROTY_RESET: Reset rotation pitch range to default
en.RCST_IDC_STRENGTHRANGE: Adjust the range of the Strength slider
en.RCST_IDC_RANDROTZ_RESET: Reset rotation roll range to default
en.RCST_IDC_SETTINGSFILE_BTN: Browse for a different space settings file.
en.RCST_IDC_RANDSCAX_RESET: Reset scale range in the X axis to default
en.RCST_IDC_DELCOLOR_BTN: Remove the selected color from the timeline.
en.RCST_IDC_RAWIMP_FILENAME: The selected RAW file's name and location.
en.RCST_IDC_RAWIMP_SIZE: Possible sizes of the RAW file.
en.RCST_IDC_RANDSCAZ_RESET: Reset scale range in the Z axis to default
en.RCST_IDC_RED: Check to show the histogram for the red channel
en.RCST_IDC_GREEN: Check to show the histogram for the green channel
en.RCST_IDC_BLUE: Check to show the histogram for the blue channel
en.RCST_IDC_PAGE_TERRAIN_SIZE_SLIDER: Set the size of the brush, in meters
en.RCST_IDC_RANGERATIOSLIDER: Adjust the range ratio of the histogram
en.RCST_IDC_PAGE_TERRAIN_STRENGTH_SLIDER: Set the strength of the brush
en.RCST_IDC_PAGE_TERRAIN_OPACITY_SLIDER: Set the opacity of the brush
en.RCST_IDC_SUNANGLE_SLIDER: The sun's inclination at midday. At 90 degrees the sun will pass in an arc directly overhead.
en.RCST_IDC_SLIDER: Adjust the minimum and maximum values of the range
en.RCST_IDC_MOONANGLE_SLIDER: The moon's inclination at midnight. At 90 degrees the moon will pass in an arc directly overhead.
en.RCST_IDC_RANDSCA_UNI: Scale the object by the same random amount on all the axes, keeping proportions
en.RCST_IDC_OBJECTS_DRAG_ON_SELECT: Check to enable moving an object by clicking and dragging it (M)
en.RCST_IDC_PLAYER_PREVIEW_MODE: Check to make the camera controls behave as if in the game (~)
en.RCST_IDC_RANDSCAX_RANGE: Adjust random scale in the X axis
en.RCST_IDC_OBJECTS_LOCK_TO_GRID: Check to enable to snap objects to the grid using the parameters below (G)
en.RCST_IDC_RANDSCAY_RANGE: Adjust random scale in the Y axis
en.RCST_IDC_RANDSCAZ_RANGE: Adjust random scale in the Z axis
en.RCST_IDC_COLORTIMELINE: The colors of the sun/ambient conditions throughout the day.
en.RCST_IDC_COLORPICKER: The color at the selected time.
en.RCST_IDC_TIMEOFDAY_SLIDER: Adjust the current time of day. This is not saved as part of the game, but allows you to view the lighting at different times.
en.RCST_IDC_SUNANIM_BTN: Edit the effect of the sun's lighting on objects in the scene.
en.RCST_IDC_CREATEANIM_BTN: Reset the current animation to the defaults.
en.RCST_IDC_R_EDIT: The red component of the selected color.
en.RCST_IDC_G_EDIT: The green component of the selected color.
en.RCST_IDC_OBJECTS_COORDS_LOCAL: Transforms will be relative to the object's own axes (F8 cycles)
en.RCST_IDC_OBJECTS_COORDS_VIEW: Transforms will be relative to the camera's view direction (F8 cycles)
en.RCST_IDC_OBJECTS_LOCK_FREE: Objects can be moved freely in all axes (F4 cycles)
en.RCST_IDC_OBJECTS_LOCK_TERRAIN: Objects will be snapped vertically to the terrain surface (F4 cycles)
en.RCST_IDC_OBJECTS_LOCK_OBSTACLE: Objects will be snapped to terrain or other object's surfaces (F4 cycles)
en.RCST_IDC_TERIMP_PLACE_BTN: Place the imported terrain onto the terrain.
en.RCST_IDC_TERIMP_BROWSE_BTN: Browse for a file to import.
en.RCST_IDC_TERIMP_EXPORT_BTN: Browse for a file to export the selected area to.
en.RCST_IDC_TERIMP_MODE_CB: Terrain import mode. Replace replaces the current terrain with the imported terrain. Additive adds to the current terrain. Subtractive subtracts from the current terrain. Overlay adds the highest point of the imported terrain and subtracts the lowest point. Min takes the minimum of the imported terrain and the current terrain. Maximum takes the maximum of the current terrain and the imported terrain.
en.RCST_IDC_TERIMP_FLIPH_BTN: Invert the heights of the imported terrain.
en.RCST_IDC_TERIMP_MIN_EDIT: Lowest height value for the imported terrain.
en.RCST_IDC_TERIMP_MIN_SLIDER: Lowest height value for the imported terrain.
en.RCST_IDC_TERIMP_MAX_EDIT: Highest height value for the imported terrain.
en.RCST_IDC_TERIMP_MAX_SLIDER: Highest height value for the imported terrain.
en.RCST_IDC_TERIMP_STRENGTH_EDIT: Strength of placing terrain. 0 means no change, 100 means full strength.
en.RCST_IDC_TERIMP_STRENGTH_SLIDER: Strength of placing terrain. 0 means no change, 100 means full strength.
en.RCST_IDC_TERIMP_ABS_CB: If enabled then height range matches the largest representable height of the native imported format. If disabled then the height range represents the highest and lowest points in the imported image. This should be enabled if importing multiple height maps.
en.RCST_IDC_TERIMP_HEIGHT_SLIDER: Set the lowest and highest height of the imported terrain.
en.RCST_IDC_TERIMP_IMPORT_CURRENT_IMAGE: Drag a texture file from the Asset Browser here
en.RCST_IDC_OPTIONS_LIGHTING_STANDARD: Use standard lighting preview mode (CTRL+L cycles)
en.RCST_IDC_OPTIONS_LIGHTING_DYNAMIC: Use dynamic lighting preview mode (CTRL+L cycles)
en.RCST_IDC_OPTIONS_LIGHTING_SPECULAR: Use specular lighting preview mode (CTRL+L cycles)
en.RCST_IDC_OPTIONS_NAVMESH_VISIBLE: Toggle visibility of the navigation mesh
en.RCST_IDC_OPTIONS_SHOW_TREE: Check elements of the scene to show them, uncheck to hide them
en.RCST_IDC_OPTIONS_FARPLANE_SLIDER: Adjust the distance to the far plane of the scene, in meters
en.RCST_IDC_OPTIONS_FARPLANE_EDIT: Type in the distance to the far plane of the scene, in meters
en.RCST_IDC_OPTIONS_SNAPS_X: Grid snap resolution in the X axis, in meters
en.RCST_IDC_OPTIONS_SNAPS_Y: Grid snap resolution in the Y axis, in meters
en.RCST_IDC_OPTIONS_SNAPS_Z: Grid snap resolution in the Z axis, in meters
en.RCST_IDC_OPTIONS_SNAPS_ANGLE: Grid snap angle used when rotating objects
en.RCST_IDC_OPTIONS_SHELLSNAPS: Set the grid X, Y, Z and angle parameters to the Shell Snaps preset
en.RCST_IDC_OPTIONS_UNITSNAPS: Set the grid X, Y and Z resolution to 1 meter, and the angle to 1 degree
en.RCST_IDC_OPTIONS_POINTONESNAPS: Set the grid X, Y and Z resolution to 10 cm, and the angle to 1 degree
en.RCST_IDC_OPTIONS_CAMERAHEIGHT_SLIDER: Set the height of the player preview mode camera, in meters, relative to the terrain You can also use Q and E to change the height while in the 3D view
en.RCST_IDC_OPTIONS_CAMERAHEIGHT_EDIT: Type in the height of the player preview mode camera, in meters, relative to the terrain You can also use Q and E to change the height while in the 3D view
en.RCST_IDC_PROJECT_COMMIT_MESSAGE: Information about the interaction with the server
en.RCST_IDC_TERRAIN_SIZE_SLIDER: Set the size of the brush, in meters
en.RCST_IDC_TERRAIN_SIZE_EDIT: Set the size of the brush, in meters
en.RCST_IDC_TERRAIN_STRENGTH_SLIDER: Set the strength of the brush
en.RCST_IDC_TERRAIN_STRENGTH_EDIT: Set the strength of the brush
en.RCST_IDC_TERRAIN_HEIGHT_SLIDER: Set the height to set the terrain to when applying the brush. Hold down the left mouse button and Ctrl key to apply explicit height, or hold down the Alt key while moving the mouse over the 3D view to sample the terrain height under the cursor
en.RCST_IDC_TERRAIN_HEIGHT_EDIT: Type the height to set the terrain to when applying the brush. Hold down the left mouse button and Ctrl key to apply explicit height, or hold down the Alt key while moving the mouse over the 3D view to sample the terrain height under the cursor
en.RCST_IDC_TERRAIN_FALLOFF_FLAT: Click to use a brush that uses the same strength in all its area
en.RCST_IDC_TERRAIN_FALLOFF_LINEAR: Click to use a linear falloff for the brush
en.RCST_IDC_TERRAIN_FALLOFF_CURVE: Click to use a smooth falloff for the brush
en.RCST_IDC_TERRAIN_FALLOFF_AVERAGE: Click to use the averaging brush, great for creating roads, paths and terraces
en.RCST_IDC_TERRAIN_ABSOLUTEHEIGHT: Click to set the terrain height to this explicit height when applying the brush (holding down Ctrl)
en.RCST_IDC_TERRAIN_FILTERS_LIST: Select the filter to use when applying the filter brush
en.RCST_IDC_TERRAIN_CUT: Click to cut holes in the terrain mesh
en.RCST_IDC_TERRAIN_REPAIR: Click to repair holes in the terrain mesh
en.RCST_IDC_TERRAIN_RELATIVEHEIGHT: Click to add this explicit height to the terrain height when applying the brush (holding down Ctrl)
en.RCST_IDC_PROJECT_COMMIT_KEEPLOCKS: Check to keep the region locked after committing changes
en.RCST_IDC_PROJECT_DISCARD_KEEPLOCKS: Check to keep the region locked after discarding changes
en.RCST_IDC_PROJECT_DISCARD_ALL: Discard all changes, get the last committed version
en.RCST_IDC_MSG_SHOW_DATE: Show the date of the messages
en.RCST_IDC_MSG_SHOW_TIME: Show the time of the messages
en.RCST_IDC_MSG_SHOW_PRIORITY: Show the priority of the messages
en.RCST_IDC_PAGE_TERRAIN_HEIGHT_MIN_EDIT: Set the minimum height for the height mask, in meters
en.RCST_IDC_PAGE_TERRAIN_HEIGHT_MAX_EDIT: Set the maximum height for the height mask, in meters
en.RCST_IDC_PAGE_TERRAIN_SLOPE_MIN_EDIT: Set the minimum slope for the slope mask, in degrees
en.RCST_IDC_PAGE_TERRAIN_SLOPE_MAX_EDIT: Set the maximum slope for the slope mask, in degrees
en.RCST_IDC_PAGE_TERRAIN_HEIGHT_FUZ_EDIT: Set the fuzzy region for the height mask, in meters
en.RCST_IDC_PAGE_TERRAIN_SLOPE_FUZ_EDIT: Set the fuzzy region for the slope mask, in degrees
en.RCST_IDC_PAGE_TERRAIN_TEXMASK_PROJ_BUTTO: If checked then the projection must match the projection below
en.RCST_IDC_PAGE_TERRAIN_TEXMASK_YAW_EDIT: The yaw of the texture projection mask in degrees
en.RCST_IDC_PAGE_TERRAIN_TEXMASK_PITCH_EDIT: The pitch of the texture projection mask in degrees
en.RCST_IDC_PAGE_TERRAIN_TEXMASK_ROLL_EDIT: The roll of the texture projection mask in degrees
en.RCST_IDC_PAGE_TERRAIN_TEXMASK_UTILING_ED: The u-scale of the texture projection mask in meters
en.RCST_IDC_PAGE_TERRAIN_TEXMASK_VTILING_ED: The v-scale of the texture projection mask in meters
en.RCST_IDC_PAGE_TERRAIN_TEXMASK_INV_BUTTON: If enabled then paint outside the selected texture. If disabled then paint over the selected texture.
en.RCST_IDC_DEFTEX_BROWSE: Browse for a default terrain texture for the new space
en.RCST_IDC_DEFTEX_PATH: Path of the default texture for the new space. Clear this field if you don't want to select a default texture.
en.RCST_IDC_OPTIONS_LOCATION_LIST: The list of camera locations You can double click to move to a location
en.RCST_IDC_OPTIONS_POS_X: The x-coordinate of the camera position
en.RCST_IDC_OPTIONS_POS_Y: The y-coordinate of the camera position
en.RCST_IDC_OPTIONS_POS_Z: The z-coordinate of the camera position
en.RCST_IDC_OPTIONS_CHUNK: The chunk in which the camera is located
en.RCST_IDC_OPTIONS_POS_MOVE: Move the camera to the coordinates specified
en.RCST_IDC_OPTIONS_CHUNK_MOVE: Move the camera to the centre of the chunk specified
en.RCST_IDC_OPTIONS_LOCATION_ADD: Add a new location using the current camera position
en.RCST_IDC_OPTIONS_LOCATION_REMOVE: Remove the selected location from the list
en.RCST_IDC_OPTIONS_LOCATION_MOVE: Move the camera to the selected location
en.RCST_IDC_OPTIONS_LOCATION_UPDATE: Update the selected location to use the current camera position
en.RCST_IDC_CHUNK_TEXTURES_SHOW: Highlight the chunk in the main view
en.RCST_IDC_CHUNK_TEXTURES_AUTOTRACK: Automatically get the chunk texture info from the current chunk under the cursor
en.RCST_IDC_PAGE_TERRAIN_SIZE_EDIT: Set the size of the brush, in meters
en.RCST_IDC_PAGE_TERRAIN_STRENGTH_EDIT: Set the strength of the brush
en.RCST_IDC_PAGE_TERRAIN_OPACITY_EDIT: Set the opacity of the brush
en.RCST_IDC_PAGE_TERRAIN_LIMIT_LAYERS_CB: If checked and painting occurs in a chunk with more than the limit number then the least-used textures will be removed. If unchecked then textures will be added indefinitely.
en.RCST_IDC_PAGE_TERRAIN_LIMIT_LAYERS_EDIT: This sets the maximum number of allowed textures per chunk during painting.
en.RCST_IDC_PAGE_TERRAIN_YAW_ANGLE_EDIT: Set the yaw of the texture projection, in degrees
en.RCST_IDC_PAGE_TERRAIN_PITCH_ANGLE_EDIT: Set the pitch of the texture projection, in degrees
en.RCST_IDC_PAGE_TERRAIN_ROLL_ANGLE_EDIT: Set the roll of the texture projection, in degrees
en.RCST_IDC_PAGE_TERRAIN_ADJUST_MASK_BUTTON: Adjust the import mask's location and orientation
en.RCST_IDC_PAGE_TERRAIN_BROWSE_MASK_BUTTON: Browse for an import mask file
en.RCST_IDC_PAGE_TERRAIN_MASK_STRENGTH: Set the import mask's strength, in percent
en.RCST_IDC_PAGE_TERRAIN_MASK_PLACE_BUTTON: Paint all of the space using the mask
en.RCST_IDC_PAGE_TERRAIN_SHOW_OVERLAY: Show an approximation of the mask on the terrain
en.RCST_IDC_PAGE_TERRAIN_RESET: Reset the texture projection to the defaults
en.RCST_IDC_PAGE_TERRAIN_TEXS_PER_CHUNK_EDI: Set the maximum number of textures per chunk before showing a warning
en.RCST_IDC_PAGE_TERRAIN_UTILING_EDIT: Set the u-width of the texture, in meters
en.RCST_IDC_PAGE_TERRAIN_VTILING_EDIT: Set the v-width of the texture, in meters
en.RCST_IDC_PAGE_TERRAIN_LINK: Lock the u-width and v-width values.
en.RCST_IDC_PAGE_TEXTURE_LATCH: Tick to show this panel whenever the Terrain Texturing tool is activated
en.RCST_IDC_HEIGHTMAP_EDITOR_SIZE: Use a higher value for a more detailed terrain mesh in editor.
en.RCST_IDC_HEIGHTMAP_SIZE: Use a higher value for a more detailed terrain mesh.
en.RCST_IDC_NORMALMAP_SIZE: Use a higher value for more accurate terrain normals.
en.RCST_IDC_HOLEMAP_SIZE: Use a higher value for more accurate control of terrain holes.
en.RCST_IDC_SHADOWMAP_SIZE: Use a higher value for more accurate terrain shadows, but calculation time can increase significantly.
en.RCST_IDC_BLENDMAP_SIZE: Use a higher value for more fine detailed terrain painting.
en.RCST_IDC_CONV_HEIGHTMAP_SIZE: Use a higher value for a more detailed terrain mesh.
en.RCST_IDC_CONV_NORMALMAP_SIZE: Use a higher value for more accurate terrain normals.
en.RCST_IDC_CONV_HOLEMAP_SIZE: Use a higher value for more accurate control of terrain holes.
en.RCST_IDC_CONV_SHADOWMAP_SIZE: Use a higher value for more accurate terrain shadows, but calculation time can increase significantly.
en.RCST_IDC_CONV_BLENDMAP_SIZE: Use a higher value for more fine detailed terrain painting.
en.RCST_IDC_RESIZE_BLENDMAP_SIZE: Use a higher value for more fine detailed terrain painting.
en.RCST_IDC_PAGE_TERRAIN_CURRENT_IMAGE: Drag and drop a texture here
en.RCST_IDC_PAGE_TERRAIN_CURRENT_MACRO_IMAG: Drag and drop a macro texture here
en.RCST_IDC_PAGE_TERRAIN_CURRENT_BUMP_IMAGE: Drag and drop a bump texture here
en.RCST_IDC_PAGE_TERRAIN_CURRENT_BUMP_MACRO: Drag and drop a bump macro texture here
en.RCST_IDC_PAGE_TERRAIN_MASKTEX_IMAGE: Drag and drop a texture here
en.RCST_IDC_PAGE_TERRAIN_MASKBUMPTEX_IMAGE: Drag and drop a bump texture here
en.RCST_IDC_PAGE_TERRAIN_AUTOFIND_BUMP_BUTT: Try to find and automatically populate an associated texture
en.RCST_IDC_PAGE_ENV_USE_LOG_AVG: Use the logarithmic average luminance instead of the arithmetic. Useful in cases where min and max luminance values have huge differences
en.RCST_IDC_PAGE_ENV_ADAPT_SPEED_EDIT: The adaptation speed of the average luminance to achieve smooth transition from one value to another. This value represents the adaptation ability of the human eye to the specific environment lighting. Higher values will cause the scene to reach target luminosity faster.
en.RCST_IDC_PAGE_ENV_HDR_AVG_LUM_UPDATE_INT: Interval in seconds for calculation the new average luminance
en.RCST_IDC_PAGE_ENV_BLOOM_BRIGHT_THRESHOLD: The minimum luminance of the pixel when it's appropriate for blooming
en.RCST_IDC_PAGE_ENV_BLOOM_BRIGHT_OFFSET_ED: Controls how much the bloomed pixel affects neighboring pixels
en.RCST_IDC_PAGE_ENV_BLOOM_AMOUNT_EDIT: Controls amount(strength) of the bloom effect in the final image
en.RCST_IDC_PAGE_ENV_EYE_LIGHT_LIMIT_EDIT: The maximal luminance of the pixel that we can see. Larger values allow us to see the brighter places more clearly
en.RCST_IDC_PAGE_ENV_EYE_DARK_LIMIT_EDIT: The minimal luminance of the pixel that we can see. Lower values allow us to see the darker places more clearly
en.RCST_IDC_PAGE_ENV_MIDDLE_GRAY_EDIT: The desired average luminance in the entire space
en.RCST_IDC_PAGE_ENV_WHITE_POINT_EDIT: The upper luminance border(limit) after which the color is considered as white
en.RCST_IDC_PAGE_ENV_ENV_SKY_LUM_MUL_EDIT: Multiplier for the final sky luminance
en.RCST_IDC_PAGE_ENV_ENV_SUNLIGHT_LUM_MUL_E: Multiplier for the final sunlight luminance
en.RCST_IDC_PAGE_ENV_SUN_LUM_MUL_EDIT: Multiplier for the final sun luminance
en.RCST_IDC_PAGE_ENV_SUN_LUM_MUL_SLIDER: Multiplier for the final sun luminance
en.RCST_IDC_PAGE_ENV_ENV_SUN_LUM_MUL_EDIT: Multiplier for the final sun luminance
en.RCST_IDC_PAGE_ENV_ENV_AMBIENT_LUM_MUL_ED: Multiplier for the final ambient luminance
en.RCST_NOISE_WAVELEN1: Set the wavelength of octave 1, in meters
en.RCST_NOISE_WAVELEN2: Set the wavelength of octave 2, in meters
en.RCST_NOISE_WAVELEN3: Set the wavelength of octave 3, in meters
en.RCST_NOISE_WAVELEN4: Set the wavelength of octave 4, in meters
en.RCST_NOISE_WAVELEN5: Set the wavelength of octave 5, in meters
en.RCST_NOISE_WAVELEN6: Set the wavelength of octave 6, in meters
en.RCST_NOISE_WAVELEN7: Set the wavelength of octave 7, in meters
en.RCST_NOISE_WAVELEN8: Set the wavelength of octave 8, in meters
en.RCST_NOISE_WEIGHT1: Set the relative weight of octave 1
en.RCST_NOISE_WEIGHT2: Set the relative weight of octave 2
en.RCST_NOISE_WEIGHT3: Set the relative weight of octave 3
en.RCST_NOISE_WEIGHT4: Set the relative weight of octave 4
en.RCST_NOISE_WEIGHT5: Set the relative weight of octave 5
en.RCST_NOISE_WEIGHT6: Set the relative weight of octave 6
en.RCST_NOISE_WEIGHT7: Set the relative weight of octave 7
en.RCST_NOISE_WEIGHT8: Set the relative weight of octave 8
en.RCST_IDC_SEED_EDIT1: Set the randomness seed for octave 1
en.RCST_IDC_SEED_EDIT2: Set the randomness seed for octave 2
en.RCST_IDC_SEED_EDIT3: Set the randomness seed for octave 3
en.RCST_IDC_SEED_EDIT4: Set the randomness seed for octave 4
en.RCST_IDC_SEED_EDIT5: Set the randomness seed for octave 5
en.RCST_IDC_SEED_EDIT6: Set the randomness seed for octave 6
en.RCST_IDC_SEED_EDIT7: Set the randomness seed for octave 7
en.RCST_IDC_SEED_EDIT8: Set the randomness seed for octave 8
en.RCST_NOISE_MIN_SAT: Set the minimum saturation of the noise
en.RCST_NOISE_MAX_SAT: Set the maximum saturation of the noise
en.RCST_NOISE_MIN_STRENGTH: Set the minimum strength of the noise
en.RCST_NOISE_MAX_STRENGTH: Set the maximum strength of the noise
en.RC_LT_GAME_OPTIONS_DESCRIPTION: (includes Game Options, Sun/Moon Inclination and Animation Colours)
en.RC_LT_SAVE_CONFIG_DESCRIPTION: (not saved as part of the configuration)
